item.title: so busy. but almost done.
item.description: check it out. the first step: yeknom industries. w00t. you will have to wait until later to see what comes next. being so busy I have barely had enough time to notice the insanely smart people who “hang” on the internet. basically I mean.. google employees. heh. for some starters - Chris Wetherell seems to be quite something. it is lovely to see good design in a tech setting. I need to redesign my site.
